name: The Council (itch)
description:
The Council is a short visual novel up for interpretation. The initial idea behind it stems from lack of motivation when dealing with mental illnesses and the struggles of convincing yourself to be productive.

The game is meant to be a short, intense, and overall unnerving experience. Audio and a dark room is recommended to play.

It is likely going to have some bugs that need ironing out - please let me know if you find any.

Email: nikgoundry@gmail.com

Update - 5/10
